Gloria es una mujer trabajadora la cual trabaja en diferentes fincas realizando actividades de aseo y servicios varios, en vista de que los ingresos que obtiene con este trabajo no son suficientes para cubrir los gastos de su hogar y el sostenimiento de sus dos hijos, desea comenzar con una actividad que le permita mejorar esos ingresos y poco a poco ser independiente; esta actividad es la producción y venta de pollos de engorde con los cuales aspira mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. Como madre cabeza de hogar está a cargo de todos los gastos, por lo que no cuenta con mucho capital para invertir en la puesta en marcha de este negocio, es por esta razón que requiere un poyo económico para la compra de pollos y gallinas ponedoras, adicionalmente necesita construir un galpón donde pueda albergarlos.
Este préstamo le permitirá tener una oportunidad de vida e independencia para disfrutarla al máximo con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gloria is an enterprising woman. She works in different farms, helping with cleaning work and other services. Given that her earnings from this work are not enough to cover household costs and to look after her children, Gloria wants to start a business that will allow her to increase her income and slowly become independent. This business will involve raising and selling chickens. Gloria hopes that this business will allow her to improve her family's living conditions. As the head of her household, Gloria is responsible for all household costs and so does not have much money to invest in starting this business. As a result she needs a loan in order to buy chickens and hens. Gloria also needs to build a coop to house the animals.

This loan will allow Gloria to have an opportunity to be independent and to enjoy life to the full with her children.

loans.use: to buy hens and chickens, and to build a coop to start her business.

loans.name: Yefferson

texts.es: Yefferson de 21 años de edad, se dedica a dos negocios por un lado elabora y vende  comidas rápidas, en su oferta alimentaria, en la que  usted puede encontrar  perros calientes,  salchichas, hamburguesas, empanadas,  papas rellenas; y por otro lado Yefferson para generar otros ingresos, también ofrece el servicio de alquiler de lavadoras, negocio que aprendió cuando ayudaba a su vecina del barrio, trasladando las máquinas a los clientes en su bicicleta. De lunes a domingos y desde las 8 de la mañana a las 10 de la noche Yefferson trabaja fuertemente para lograr un buen servicio entre su clientela del barrio y sectores aledaños. Su meta es ampliarla más comprando más lavadoras para aumentar sus ingresos y poder cumplir su desafío de continuar su carrera universitaria. En la actualidad Yefferson está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo mediante el cual comprará 3 lavadoras, con ello poco a poco cumplirá sus sueños inmediatos y futuros.
texts.en:
Yefferson is 21 years old, he works two businesses. On one side, he makes and sells fast food, the food that you can find he offers includes hot dogs, sausages, hamburgers, meat pies and stuffed potatoes. On the other side to generate other income, he also offers a washing machine rental service, a business that he learned when he was helping a friend from the neighborhood shifting customers' washing machines on his bicycle.

From Monday to Sunday, and from 8 in the morning to 10 at night, Yefferson works hard to achieve a good service with his customers in the neighborhood and surrounding areas. His goal is to grow his business more, buying more washing machines to increase his earnings and to be able to fulfill his challenge of continuing his university education.

Currently Yefferson is applying for a Kiva loan, the first loan he is taking with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo in which he will buy 3 washing machines, and with this, bit by bit he will achieve his immediate and future dreams.

loans.use: to buy three washing machines.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy rice, beans and vegetable oil.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy prepaid charge cards, kitchen utensils and condiments.

loans.name: Erickson Josue

texts.es:
Erickson es un joven emprendedor, tiene 19 años de edad, es soltero y vive en Huarochiri junto a su familia.
Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Desde hace más de 1 año trabaja como Ayudante en una Ferretería, le va muy bien porque es una persona muy trabajadora, responsable, honesta y siempre brinda un servicio de calidad a los clientes. Su mayor motivación en la vida es su familia, es por ellos que lucha día a día para poder brindarles un futuro mejor.
Erickson está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comprar un equipo de sonido, para su vivienda, de esta manera estará mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia y él seguirá trabajando con la misma tranquilidad con la que siempre labora. Con esto se esforzará mucho más para más adelante poder cumplir su mayor sueño: "Tener su propio negocio".
texts.en:
Erickson, 19, is a young entrepreneur who is single and lives in Huarochiri with his family.

He is very determined to get ahead and for over a year has been working as an assistant at a hardware store.  It is going well for him because he is a very hard-working, responsible, honest person who always gives the best service to customers.  His greatest motivation in life is his family and it is for them that he works hard every day to give them a brighter future.

Erickson is grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to your support he will be able to buy sound equipment for his house to improve his family's quality of life.  He will continue working with the same peace of mind that he is used to and strive harder to reach his goal which is "To have his own business".

loans.use: To buy sound equipment.

loans.name: Jose Jaime

texts.es:
José es un hombre muy laborioso, con muchas ganas de salir adelante y progresar.
Desde hace 20 años se viene dedicando a la venta de electrodomésticos en el municipio de Puerto Boyacá, son productos de muy buena calidad y sus clientes lo reconocen por su gran trayectoria y experiencia en este campo además de su excelente servicio y amabilidad.
Desde muy niño sintió gran afinidad con el comercio y las ventas, por lo que hoy en día tiene grandes habilidades que le permiten mantenerse y progresar en el mercado.
Solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de nuevos electrodomésticos que le permitan aumentar su inventario y generar nuevas ventas.
Tiene la esperanza de poder salir adelante y tener su propio almacén de electrodomésticos, generando empleo e ingresos estables.
texts.en:
Jose is a hard-working man who is determined to get ahead and prosper.

For 20 years he has been selling domestic appliances in the municipality of Puerto Boyacá.  His products are of a very good quality and his customers acknowledge Jose's years of experience in the field, as well as his excellent service and kindness.

Ever since he was a young boy, Jose has had an affinity for commerce and sales.  Therefore, he now has great skills that will allow him to stay in the market and prosper.

The loan he is requesting is to buy new merchandise to increase his inventory and generate new sales.  He hopes to continue prospering and one day have his own appliance store and generate employment and a stable income.

loans.use: To buy domestic appliances to increase his inventory.

loans.name: Grupo Xojolá Group

texts.es: Julia es una joven de 27 años de edad, Soltera (Es la que aparece de primero de izquierda a derecha porta una blusa de color azul), vive en el municipio de Nahuala, departamento de Sololá, su actividad principal es agricultura, donde sus padre le enseñaron el proceso productivo principalmente del cultivo de banano, donde el fruto lo vende a nivel regional, en la comercialización es donde obtiene la mayor parte de sus ingresos que le ayuda para el sostenimiento de su familia, es por ello que formaron un grupo para poder apoyarse entre ellas y así poder vender un mayor volumen de producción, Julia solicita un crédito para comprar insumos para el mantenimiento del cultivo de banano, y con ello cumplir su sueño que es poder construir su casa propia.
texts.en:
Julia is a young person of 27 years old, single, (she is the one first from the left wearing a blue blouse), she lives in the municipality of Nahuala, in the Solola department. 

Her primary job is agriculture, which her parents taught her, principally the process of banana production. The fruit is sold at a regional level, the most part of the earnings are made in the commercialization which helps sustain her family, which is why they formed a group - to be able to support each other and to be able to sell a greater volume of the production.

Julia is asking for a loan to be able to buy supplies for maintaining the banana plantation, and with this achieve her dream of being able to build her own home.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for the maintenance of a banana plantation.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is single with no children.  She sells used clothes at the market and has been in this business for 1 year.  She works in a shop seven days out of every week and sells on a retail basis. She resides in her own house and the family has access to electricity but not to piped water. Her monthly expenses include water and power charges.  

She has applied for a loan of 200,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy a bale of used clothes. She decided to join MCDT-SACCO because of good customer care and being friendly. 

Her major business challenges include seasonality and ever-increasing prices of commodities in Uganda. She aspires to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: To buy a bale of used clothes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a solar energy system.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more livestock to sell

loans.name: Mbeyu

texts.en:
This is Mbeyu. She previously accessed a loan that she used to stock her food stall business. Her earnings were a big help for her personal, household, and business expenditures.

She is requesting a loan to purchase wheat flour, maize flour, biscuits, rice, and beans for resale.

She appreciates Kiva for their financial support..

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, maize flour, biscuits, rice, and beans for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools to be able to open another workshop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, palm oil, and cooking seasonings for resale.

loans.name: Jhon Jairo

texts.es:
Solo las personas del campo gozan diariamente la abrumadora y encantadora belleza de nuestra madre tierra, esas zonas verdes que decoran el más hermoso paisaje y que encanta solo mirándolo. 
Jhon es un agricultor que goza de estos paisajes y que trabaja en forma natural las tierra para sacar ese fruto que llega a los hogares diariamente pero se ve enfrentado con problemas tanto de plagas como climáticas que afectan la producción y los altos costos de los insumos no ayudan a los campesinos a mejorar este problema por dicha razón quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de fungicidas, pesticidas para acabar con unas plagas que se le comen sus cultivos y afectan sus árboles. Su gran sueño es mejorar los terrenos familiares con mayor variedad de cultivos para engrandecer el nombre de su padre.
texts.en:
Only country people can enjoy the abundant and lovely beauty of our mother earth every day, these green areas which decorate the most beautiful landscape and enchants one just looking at it.

Jhon is a farmer who enjoys these landscapes and works the land in a natural way to get the fruit which comes to homes daily, but he has so many problems both with pests and the weather which affect the production and the high cost of the supplies do not help country people to fix this problem. 

For the aforementioned reason, he is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, pesticide, fungicide to finish off the pests that are eating his crops and affecting his trees.

His big dreams is to improve his family land with a better variety of crops to laud the name of his father.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticide, fungicide to finish off the pests that are plaguing his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fabrics.
